control.description: Additional exit button path to script

control.label: [ONCLICK Skin.SetString(CustomFocus,-2,)] 2 [/ONCLICK][ONCLICK Skin.SetString(CustomFocus,-1,)] 1 [/ONCLICK][COLOR=grey3]- $LOCALIZE[88020] [/COLOR]|[ONCLICK Skin.Reset(CustomFocus)] $LOCALIZE[571] [/ONCLICK]|[COLOR=grey3] $LOCALIZE[88021] -[/COLOR][ONCLICK Skin.SetString(CustomFocus,1,)] 1 [/ONCLICK][ONCLICK Skin.SetString(CustomFocus,2,)] 2 [/ONCLICK] |[ONCLICK Skin.SetNumeric(CustomFocus)] $LOCALIZE[88022] [/ONCLICK]
